name: TextDrawSetPreviewModel
warnings: The textdraw MUST use the font type TEXT_DRAW_FONT_MODEL_PREVIEW in order for this function to have effect.
versions: This function was added in SA-MP 0.3x and will not work in earlier versions!
tips: Use TextDrawBackgroundColor to set the background color behind the model.
description: Set the model for a textdraw model preview. Click here to see this function's effect.

params_body.name: text
params_body.description: The textdraw id that will display the 3D preview.

params_body.name: modelindex
params_body.description: The GTA SA or SA:MP model ID to display.

return_values: This function does not return any specific values.
